item.description:
You must register for this decoupage class directly with Abeille.

A great class for all ages! Learn about decoupaging and resin! Create something unique with everyday items. In this class you will learn to create either an eco-friendly piece of jewelry or a unique way to display your jewelry with this original decorated bottle.

You will collage a bracelet cuff or recycled wine bottle using various papers and recycled materials. You can hang your rings, earrings, necklaces, and bracelets from a branch or the mouth of the bottle!

Bottles, papers and glues will be provided. Cuffs are an additional $5. You can bring any 2-D materials or papers you would like to incorporate into the decoupage design. Additional papers and materials are also available for purchase.

Be sure to register online at http://www.abeille.us...

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Decoupage class in February
